channel.title: Complexity l Elevation l JustBrid
channel.description:
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/bw289hadly7fn64/JustBrid.rar"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/bw289hadly7fn64/JustBrid.rar[/URL]
[B]Call it a leech, whatever you'd like to call it, do so. It's ment for people who want to hybrid and whatnot. 100% credits go to bravey for complexity. Fixed a few things, changed a few things, come and PK.[/B]
Everything Complexity/Elevation had PvP wise.
Removed the random shit(Camel mask, PKP boots.)
Removed donator req's
Tokhaar-kal absorbs 10% of damage recieved, randomly.
Completionist cape absorbs 10% of damage recieved, randomly.
Fixed Divine and Elysian effects.
Mystery box gives random rewards such as godsword hilts and blades, aswell as some random pkp items(Use it at your own risk).
Glory is used for PKing spots, I will add more in the future.
You recieve 5PKP a kill, along with a bonus of 1-5PKP, with the maximum PKP recieved being 10.
Starter is more adaptable to the server. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RQSPGlrma58[/youtube]
[B]Pictures[/B] Starter [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1qphts.jpg[/img]
Thieving [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ilj6fc.jpg[/img]
Mystery box [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1y4b5i.jpg[/img]
PKP shop [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ep59h0.jpg[/img]
Effects [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/b7jkp3.jpg[/img]
PKing spots(will add more) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/23m91ci.jpg[/img]

item.title: Complexity l Elevation l JustBrid
item.dc:creator: @JUSTBRID JUSTBRID
item.description:
@JUSTBRID wrote:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/bw289hadly7fn64/JustBrid.rar

Call it a leech, whatever you’d like to call it, do so.
It’s ment for people who want to hybrid and whatnot.
100% credits go to bravey for complexity.
Fixed a few things, changed a few things, come and PK.

Everything Complexity/Elevation had PvP wise.

Removed the random shit(Camel mask, PKP boots.)

Removed donator req’s

Tokhaar-kal absorbs 10% of damage recieved, randomly.

Completionist cape absorbs 10% of damage recieved, randomly.

Fixed Divine and Elysian effects.

Mystery box gives random rewards such as godsword hilts and blades,
aswell as some random pkp items(Use it at your own risk).

Glory is used for PKing spots, I will add more in the future.

You recieve 5PKP a kill, along with a bonus of 1-5PKP,
with the maximum PKP recieved being 10.

Starter is more adaptable to the server.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RQSPGlrma58[/youtube]
